project_abstract.cdata: The International Development Association will provide financing for a time-slice of five years to help implement a long-term North-West Frontier Province Primary Education Program (NWFP) government program in primary education with special measures to improve girls' education. The objectives are to improve: (a) access, equity and efficiency; (b) the quality of the learning environment, and (c) the organizational framework, planning and management. Beneficiary participation will be instituted as a means to achieve all of the objectives.
